spec_data.Name: texlive-shapes
spec_data.Description:
The shapes set of macros allows drawing regular polygons; their
corresponding reentrant stars in all their variations; and
fractionally filled circles (useful for visually demonstrating
the nature of fractions) in Metapost.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:29:22 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Draw polygons, reentrant stars, and fractions in circles with Metapost
